name: Ghost City Evaders - NO ADS!
description:
Caution: Super fun! Enter Ghost City at your own risk. You may never want to leave this Awesomeness!

Paid - Paid version includes the whole 300 levels and no ads!
Free (LITE) - Free version includes 21 levels and no ads!

Ghost City is calling you for a very important mission, the city has been overtaken by ghosts and only you can save the city now. Enter Ghost City now and begin your mission. Swipe three or more matching ghosts to rid the city of them.

These ghosts deliver to you the ultimate challenge in a match 3 game, only persistence and patience will get you to the top building were you can once and for all reach your goal to free the city of all these sneaky ghosts.

Don't be fooled by these cute ghosts they will mislead and thwart your attempts to match them by all shifting color to a plain white ghost so you don't know which ghosts can be matched and they will also fade and go transparent, only the toughest of opponents will not be deterred, and will accept the challenge to take on these super cute ghosts.

The city is counting on you, don't let them down!

Begin your mission today!

A match 3 game like no other seen before, beautiful stylized graphics, wonderful pleasant music.

Super fun and completely AWESOME!


HOW TO PLAY

* Match same color ghosts to rid the city of them.

* These ghosts won’t be easy to catch, they will periodically blink on and off, and change color to completely white, in order to avoid being matched by you. They’re sneaky and don’t want to be caught but you can do it, you can outsmart a ghost.

* Match 4 ghosts of the same color and receive a special striped ghost, that has the ability to wipe out an entire row or column of ghosts.

* Match 5 ghosts and get the special ghost blast piece that has the special powers to be matched with ANY color ghost and blast them all off the board game.

* Each mission must be completed in a set number of moves or a set amount of time.


FEATURES

* NO ADS!

* NO IN APP PURCHASES!

* Play offline!

* 300 Levels of excitement!

* Outstanding graphics!

* Awesome audio!

* Enjoyment to the fullest!

* Thrilling to the max!
